name: Strike Shot - Cube Gun War 3D
description:
Do you like playing all these shooting games, sitting in front of TV? What about to make a journey into the heart of shooting game? You are locked into 8 bit world, and now you have to shoot it's habitant, if you want to survive. Meet Strike Shot - Cube Gun War 3D – new level of shooters! Everything in this game is made from pixels, even your weapon and yourself.

HOW TO PLAY: In truth, there is no rules – just try to survive. You can shoot your enemies like a real sniper assassin and explore pixel world – the chance of lifetime, you know.

Strike Shot - Cube Gun War 3D game features:
• 1 person shooter 3D;
• Old-school pixel graphics;
• 2D 8 bit world became 3D;
• Addictive war simulator;
• Special map to explore.

Strike Shot - Cube Gun War 3D world opens doors for you – enjoy this fascinating land and survive this mortal battle!
